settings.title: Need help? We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: Where do you ship to?
settings.answer: We currently ship to all pincodes across India. Your orders are shipped from our warehouse in Ahmedabad using trusted partners like BlueDart, Delhivery, and others to ensure safe and timely delivery.

settings.question: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
Delivery times vary by pin code. For metro cities, it’s usually 5 working days. Tier 1 and 2 cities typically take 5-7 days, and other areas may take up to 7 days. However, around 93% of orders are delivered in under 5 days across all pin codes.

Please note, there’s an additional 1 business day for order preparation and dispatch.

settings.question: Where can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order is processed and shipped, we’ll send the tracking details to you via email and WhatsApp. Alternatively, you can track your order directly here (Link).

settings.question: I want to make changes to my address. How can I do that?
settings.answer:
We get it—mistakes happen! If you’ve entered the wrong address or need to make any changes, please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. We’ll do our best to help.

Please keep in mind that if your order is already on its way, it might be too late to make changes, and the delivery could be delayed.

Keep in mind, changes might not be possible once the order is dispatched from our warehouse.
